title: Prime minister condoles death of former JI deputy chief
content:
ISLAMABAD, Oct 4 (APP): Prime Minister Shehbaz Sharif on Friday condoled the death of former Naib Amir of Jamat-e-Islami Muhammad Aslam Saleemi.
Remembering him as an intellectual and a seasoned politician, the prime minister said that with Aslam Saleemi’s death, Pakistan’s politics has become bereft of a prominent political figure.
He prayed to Allah Almighty for peace for the departed soul and strength for the bereaved family to bear the loss.
